data.lyric:
[ti:Wait a Minute!]
[ar:Willow]
[al:ARDIPITHECUS]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Wait a Minute! - WILLOW (维罗·史密斯)
[00:19.40]Wait a minute
[00:20.49]
[00:21.48]I think I left my conscience on your front door step
[00:25.49]
[00:28.89]Wait a minute
[00:30.04]
[00:30.91]I think I left my consciousness in the 6th dimension
[00:35.64]
[00:37.93]But I'm here right now right now right now
[00:40.90]Just sitting in a cloud oh wow
[00:42.91]I'm here right now right now right now with you oh wow oh wow
[00:47.30]
[00:48.44]I don't even care
[00:50.53]Run my hands through your hair
[00:52.34]You wanna run your fingers through mine
[00:54.81]But my dreads too thick and that's alright
[00:57.56]Hold on wait a minute
[00:59.34]
[00:59.86]Fill my heart's attention
[01:01.67]
[01:02.36]Hold on wait a minute
[01:04.11]
[01:04.67]I left my consciousness in the 6th dimension
[01:08.72]Left my soul in his vision
[01:11.22]Let's go get it oh oh
[01:13.59]Let's go get it oh oh
[01:15.86]
[01:17.14]Some things don't work
[01:18.61]
[01:19.53]Some things are bound to be
[01:21.97]Some things they hurt
[01:23.31]
[01:24.26]And they tell the body

[01:28.84]
[01:30.26]And I read those pages you really love me baby
[01:34.90]
